summary: Completed comprehensive Phase 2 testing of My Inbox MediaÂ® corporate website. All backend APIs (18/18 tests) and frontend features are working correctly. External data fetching from mimprofile.e-mim.in is functional with 8 services and 79 client logos. Admin panel authentication and CRUD operations verified. Multi-page navigation, contact form, and responsive design tested successfully across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.

backend_issues.notes: All backend endpoints working perfectly with 100% success rate

passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint (200 OK)
Backend: Root API endpoint (200 OK)
Backend: External services API - 8 services retrieved from mimprofile.e-mim.in
Backend: External clients API - 79 client logos retrieved from mimprofile.e-mim.in
Backend: Contact form submission with database storage
Backend: Blog posts endpoint (empty state working)
Backend: Testimonials endpoint (empty state working)
Backend: Case studies endpoint (empty state working)
Backend: Admin login with JWT authentication (admin@myinboxmedia.com)
Backend: Get current user endpoint
Backend: Blog CRUD operations (create, update, delete)
Backend: Testimonial CRUD operations (create, delete)
Backend: Case study CRUD operations (create, delete)
Backend: Admin contacts retrieval (6 contact messages found)
Frontend: Homepage loads with hero section, stats, services preview, CTA section
Frontend: Hero title and subtitle display correctly
Frontend: CTA buttons ('Explore Our Services', 'Get in Touch') working
Frontend: Stats section displays 4 stat cards with CountUp animation
Frontend: Services preview section displays 4 services dynamically
Frontend: Navigation to Services page - 8 services displayed dynamically
Frontend: Navigation to Clients page - 79 client logos displayed in carousel
Frontend: Navigation to About page working
Frontend: Navigation to Blog page working (empty state)
Frontend: Navigation to Case Studies page working (empty state)
Frontend: Navigation to Testimonials page working (empty state)
Frontend: Navigation to Contact page working
Frontend: Contact form validation and submission successful
Frontend: Contact form fields (name, email, phone, service, message) working
Frontend: Admin login page loads correctly
Frontend: Admin login with credentials successful
Frontend: Admin dashboard redirect after login working
Frontend: Navigation active state highlighting working
Frontend: Color scheme (Navy #1E2A44 and Orange #E55227) implemented
Frontend: 3D hover effects on service cards working
Frontend: Footer displays correctly on all pages
Frontend: Mobile responsive design - hamburger menu working
Frontend: Mobile menu opens and closes correctly
Frontend: Tablet responsive design working
Frontend: Global presence ribbon with country flags displayed
Frontend: Badges (100% Bootstrapped, ISO Certified, GDPR Compliant) displayed
